author: Warner Todd Huston
title: NFL Agent Buddy Baker Lost Both Parents to Coronavirus Within Six Minutes of Each Other
description: NFL Agent Buddy Baker relayed the grim experience of losing both parents, both of whom passed away only six minutes apart from complications from the Wuhan virus.
content:
NFL Agent Buddy Baker relayed the grim experience of losing both parents, both of whom passed away only six minutes apart from complications from the Wuhan virus.
